message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer the product to you for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $1100000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After reviewing your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as high as $1050000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another concession. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $1030000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1040000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your determination, but I'm still not willing to go as high as $1040000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another concession. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $1020000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth.
I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. After reviewing your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1035000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as high as $1035000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another concession. I'm proposing a counteroffer of $1025000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1032500.
